InstructionSet.h

00001 // $Id: InstructionSet.h 60 2009-06-15 06:46:22Z sibbernsen.dan $
00002 
00003 #ifndef INSTRUCTION_SET_H
00004 #define INSTRUCTION_SET_H
00005 #include "Instruction.h"
00006 
00007 #include <vector>
00008 
00009 /*
00010         Design Pattern Used: Composite
00011         Class: InstructionSet
00012                 The Composite portion of the Composite pattern.
00013                 This contains Instruction* children.
00014 */
00015 
00016 namespace BabelShark
00017 {
00018         typedef std::vector<Instruction*> InstructionCollection;
00019         class InstructionSet: public Instruction
00020         {
00021                 public:
00022                         InstructionSet(unsigned int size, char* name);
00023                         ~InstructionSet();
00024 
00025                         //returns the first Child of the InstructionSet list.
00026                         Instruction* GetChild();
00027 
00028                         //Adds a child Instruction to the list.
00029                         void Add(Instruction*);
00030 
00031                         //attempts to Interpret the buffer according to the children.
00032                         void Interpret(char* buffer);
00033 
00034             //will be used to Display data to the WireShark output
00035             char* Display();
00036 
00037                         //Creates an iterator used to traverse the direct children.
00038                         void CreateIterator();
00039                         InstructionCollection::iterator GetIterator(){ return _ListIter;}
00040 
00041             // Override
00042             unsigned int GetSizeInBytes();
00043                 private:
00044                         InstructionCollection _List;
00045                         InstructionCollection::iterator _ListIter;
00046         };
00047 }
00048 
00049 #endif//INSTRUCTION_SET_H
